$WIMI $AAPL $BIDU $FB The convergence of our physical and digital worlds through metaverse platforms is quickly becoming a meaningful opportunity for luxury brands. Our time during the pandemic taught us that there are limitations to the physical world — but also that many of the virtual alternatives we have created can even be preferable to real ones. In 2022, brands will find that they will have to maximize their digital presence and continuously integrate emerging technologies to stay relevant.🔥🔥🔥

Apple’s Car, is part of an Ecosystem, the AppleVerse.  TSLA, is not part of an Ecosystem.  The IOS AR/AI Software for Apple Car, makes the Car itself, an AR Device from within…no Glasses needed!  The Apple Car, is more than a vehicle.  Prepare to be amazed.  More news to come.  😎
